title.narrative: GAVE PROJECT- Galgaduud Vocational Education Development Project

description.narrative: Since the beginning of 1990 the destructive and prologued civil was in Somalia collapsed also the country?s social infrastructure and education system. The civil war has destroyed educational facilities and influenced the educational possibilities in all o ver Somalia. Many teachers have left the country due to instability and there is a need for skilled teachers. The provision of vocational and higher education in Galgaduud region is weak. There are a few private universities. In addition there are some NG Os that provide some kind of technical training. But there is lack of skilled teaching stand study materials and the school fees are often high. Also the selection of study programmes offered is very limited. Therefore some youths and high school graduates move to Mogadishu in search of better educational possibilities but many are completed left out of vocational training. On a larger perspective the challenge is also the lack of coordination and quality control of education. There are no common curriculu ms or standards. This project is a continuation for the project that started in 2015 which aims at the development of vocational education in Galgaduud region. In the project quality vocational education will be provided. The education will be started wit h nurse training. In the future it will be possible to extend the education also to other fields. The long term objectives of the project are to enhance the sustainable development of education empowerment of the local community and decrease extreme povert y. These goals will be achieved with a long-term project (1+3+3 years) and Sahed is now applying for funding for the continuation project for years 2016-2018.The activities in the continuation project are: - Training of teachers and enhancement of their pe dagogical and professional skills. The staff of the project cooperation partner in Finland DIAK will act as trainers. - The establishment of nurse training and the preparatory studies related to it (such as English and mathematics)- The aqcuiring of neces sary study materials- The establishment of a library and computer lab in the educational premises - The training of the community members in health issues- Capacity building and ooperation with Ministry of Education and Ministry of Health of Somalia and the local government and other actors in the field of education to improve the quality control and coordination of education.
